thread.section_title: Gettington.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gettington.com | www.gettington.com
thread.title: Clarence Myers

author: Clarence Myers
title: Clarence Myers
text: As I stated in my previous review I think that the shipping cost are high. I think Gettington should be up to par with other online companies. You do have promotional shipping offers, but that is just a bandaid solution and can only be applied to certain items. As an example my previous purchase the shipping cost was almost 1/5 of the cost of the merchandise I purchased.
